meanings.sent1: The flowers will wither without water.
meanings.sent2: Leaves wither in the hot sun.

meanings.definition: To cause to shrivel or dry up
meanings.sent1: The scorching heat will wither the plants in no time.
meanings.sent2: Neglect can wither even the strongest relationships.
meanings.sent3: The evil witch's curse withered the beautiful princess into an old hag.
meanings.sent4: His harsh words seemed to wither her confidence instantly.
meanings.sent5: The frost withered the delicate petals of the flower, turning them brown and lifeless.
